description: Cardiff Devils claim a convincing 6-2 win against title hopefuls Sheffield Steelers in the Elite League.
title: Devils fire six past title hopefuls Steelers
title_page: Elite League: Devils fire six past title hopefuls Steelers - BBC Sport
